00175     //
00176     // IP configuration mode for ethernet cameras.
00177     //
00178     enum IpConfig
00179     {
00180         IpConfigUnknown      = 0,
00181         IpConfigPersistent   = 1,            // Use persistent IP settings
00182         IpConfigDhcp         = 2,            // Use DHCP, fallback to AutoIP
00183         IpConfigAutoIp       = 4,            // Use AutoIP only
00184     };
00185 
00186     struct IPSettings
00187     {
00188         // IP configuration mode: persistent, DHCP & AutoIp, or AutoIp only.
00189         IpConfig           config_mode;
00190         // IP configuration mode supported by the camera
00191         unsigned long       config_mode_support;
00192 
00193         // Current IP configuration.  Ignored for PvCameraIpSettingsChange().
00194         // All values are in network byte order (i.e. big endian).
00195         unsigned long       current_ip_address;
00196         unsigned long       current_ip_subnet;
00197         unsigned long       current_ip_gateway;
00198 
00199         // Persistent IP configuration.  See "ConfigMode" to enable persistent
00200         // IP settings.  All values are in network byte order.
00201         unsigned long       persisten_ip_addr;
00202         unsigned long       persistent_ip_subnet;
00203         unsigned long       persistent_ip_gateway;
00204 
00205         IPSettings()
00206         {
00207             config_mode = IpConfigUnknown;
00208             config_mode_support = 0;
00209             current_ip_address = 0;
00210             current_ip_subnet = 0;
00211             current_ip_gateway = 0;
00212             persisten_ip_addr = 0;
00213             persistent_ip_subnet = 0;
00214             persistent_ip_gateway = 0;
00215         };
00216 
00217         bool matches(const IPSettings &other)const
00218         {
00219             if (config_mode != 0 && other.config_mode != 0 &&
00220                     config_mode != other.config_mode)
00221                     return false;
00222             if (config_mode_support != 0 && other.config_mode_support != 0 &&
00223                     config_mode_support != other.config_mode_support)
00224                     return false;
00225             if (current_ip_address != 0 && other.current_ip_address != 0 &&
00226                     current_ip_address != other.current_ip_address)
00227                     return false;
00228             if (current_ip_subnet != 0 && other.current_ip_subnet != 0 &&
00229                     current_ip_subnet != other.current_ip_subnet)
00230                     return false;
00231             if (current_ip_gateway != 0 && other.current_ip_gateway != 0 &&
00232                     current_ip_gateway != other.current_ip_gateway)
00233                     return false;
00234             if (persisten_ip_addr != 0 && other.persisten_ip_addr != 0 &&
00235                     persisten_ip_addr != other.persisten_ip_addr)
00236                     return false;
00237             if (persistent_ip_subnet  != 0 && other.persistent_ip_subnet!= 0 &&
00238                     persistent_ip_subnet != other.persistent_ip_subnet)
00239                     return false;
00240             if (persistent_ip_gateway != 0 && other.persistent_ip_gateway != 0 &&
00241                     persistent_ip_gateway != other.persistent_ip_gateway)
00242                     return false;
00243             return true;
00244         };
00245     };

00247     //
00248     // Camera interface type (i.e. firewire, ethernet):
00249     //
00250     enum Interface
00251     {
00252         InterfaceUnknown,
00253         InterfaceFirewire,
00254         InterfaceEthernet,
00255         InterfaceUSB       
00256     };
00257 
00258     static inline std::string enumInterfaceToStr(Interface i)
00259     {
00260         switch(i)
00261         {
00262             case InterfaceUnknown:
00263                 return "InterfaceUnknown";
00264             case InterfaceFirewire:
00265                 return "InterfaceFirewire";
00266             case InterfaceEthernet:
00267                 return "InterfaceEthernet";
00268              case InterfaceUSB:
00269                 return "InterfaceUSB";
00270             default:
00271                 throw std::runtime_error("no Interface enum value found");
00272 
00273         }
00274         return "";
00275     }
00276 
00277     //
00278     // Camera information type.
00279     //
00280     struct CamInfo
00281     {
00282         unsigned long       unique_id ;       // Unique value for each camera
00283         std::string         serial_string;    // Camera's serial number
00284         unsigned long       part_number;      // Camera part number
00285         unsigned long       part_version;     // Camera part version
00286         unsigned long       permitted_access; // A combination of tPvAccessFlags
00287         unsigned long       interface_id;     // Unique value for each interface
00288                                               // or bus
00289         Interface          interface_type;   // Interface type; see
00290                                               // tPvInterface
00291         std::string         display_name;     // People-friendly camera name
00292         bool                reachable;        // indicates if the camera is
00293                                               // reachable (same sub net)
00294         IPSettings         ip_settings;      // ip settings for ethernet
00295                                               // cameras
00296 
00297         CamInfo()
00298         {
00299             unique_id = 0;
00300             part_number = 0;
00301             part_version = 0;
00302             permitted_access = 0;
00303             interface_id = 0;
00304             interface_type = InterfaceUnknown;
00305             reachable = false;
00306         };
00307 
00308         bool matches(const CamInfo &other)const
00309         {
00310             if (unique_id != 0 && other.unique_id != 0 &&
00311                     unique_id != other.unique_id)
00312                     return false;
00313             if (part_number != 0 && other.part_number != 0 &&
00314                     part_number != other.part_number)
00315                     return false;
00316             if (part_version != 0 && other.part_version != 0 &&
00317                     part_version != other.part_version)
00318                     return false;
00319             if (permitted_access != 0 && other.permitted_access != 0 &&
00320                     permitted_access != other.permitted_access)
00321                     return false;
00322             if (interface_id != 0 && other.interface_id != 0 &&
00323                     interface_id != other.interface_id)
00324                     return false;
00325             if (interface_type != 0 && other.interface_type != 0 &&
00326                     interface_type != other.interface_type)
00327                     return false;
00328             if (serial_string.size() != 0 && other.serial_string.size() != 0 &&
00329                     serial_string != other.serial_string)
00330                     return false;
00331             if (display_name.size() != 0 && other.display_name.size() != 0 &&
00332                     display_name != other.display_name)
00333                     return false;
00334           //  if (reachable && !other.reachable)
00335           //          return false;
00336             if(!ip_settings.matches(other.ip_settings))
00337                 return false;
00338             return true;
00339         };
00340     };
